about_the_game:
ShibaWarriors

Welcome to the neon-lit, dystopian battleground of ShibaWarriors, a high-octane cyberpunk ego shooter where you face off against relentless bots in intense combat. Step into the shoes of a cybernetically enhanced warrior, equipped with advanced weaponry and cutting-edge technology, and dominate the streets of a sprawling cyberpunk metropolis.

Gameplay:

Singleplayer with Bots: Hone your skills and tactics by battling intelligent AI opponents in various challenging scenarios.
Cybernetic Enhancements: Upgrade your character with a range of cybernetic implants that provide unique abilities and tactical advantages.
Diverse Arsenal: Arm yourself with an extensive selection of futuristic weapons, each customizable to suit your combat style.
Dynamic Combat: Experience fast-paced, strategic firefights that demand quick reflexes and smart tactics.
Vibrant Environments: Fight across different parts of a sprawling cyberpunk city, each with its own strategic elements and visual flair.

Key Features:

Singleplayer with AI Bots: Test your combat skills against challenging AI bots that adapt to your playstyle.
Customizable Loadouts: Personalize your warrior with a wide array of cybernetic enhancements and weapon modifications.
Cyberpunk Aesthetic: Immerse yourself in a beautifully crafted cyberpunk world, complete with neon lights, futuristic architecture, and gritty streets.
Intense Firefights: Engage in dynamic and tactical combat scenarios that keep you on the edge of your seat.
Strategic Gameplay: Utilize the environment, cybernetic abilities, and your arsenal to outmaneuver and overpower your enemies.
High-Quality Graphics: Enjoy stunning visuals and detailed environments that bring the cyberpunk city to life.

name: ShibaWarriors

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Dual-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM

short_description: ShibaWarriors is a fast-paced cyberpunk ego shooter where you battle against AI bots. Customize your cybernetic warrior with advanced enhancements and futuristic weapons to dominate the neon-lit streets of a sprawling dystopian city.
